mapper.select: select seat from booking where tseq = #{tseq} and dday = #{dday}
select sum(head) from booking where seat=#{seat} and tseq=#{tseq} and dday=#{dday}
select b.bseq, b.id, b.dday, t.time, b.seat, b.head, b.bstatus, t.category from booking b, total_ent t where b.tseq=t.tseq and id=#{id} order by dday desc
select b.bseq, t.tseq, t.tname, b.id, b.dday, b.seat, b.head, b.bstatus,t.price,t.category from booking b, total_ent t where b.tseq=t.tseq
select b.bseq, t.tseq, t.tname, b.id, b.dday, b.seat, b.head, b.bstatus,t.price,t.category from booking b, total_ent t where b.tseq=t.tseq and category = #{category}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM booking WHERE id=#{id} and bseq=#{bseq}
